mapper.select: SELECT s.shopId, s.shopName, s.shopDesc, s.shopAddr, s.phone, s.shopImg, s.priority, s.createTime, s.lastEditTime, s.enableStatus, s.advice, a.areaId, a.areaName, sc.shopCategoryId, sc.shopCategoryName FROM tb_shop s, tb_area a, tb_shop_category sc WHERE s.areaId=a.areaId AND s.shopCategoryId = sc.shopCategoryId AND s.shopId = #{shopId}
